problem.p: Try to guess the demographics of the OMSCS program!
What is the median age of OMSCS students?

choicegroup.label: What is the median age of OMSCS students?
choicegroup.choice: 24 That's the median age for the on-campus program, but the online program is pretty different!
29 You're right that the OMSCS students are older than residential students, but they're even older than that!
34 That's right! By comparison, the median age for the on-campus program is about 23 years old.
39 Although the median age is younger, over 40% of the program is nonetheless over the age of 35.

div.p: The median age in the OMSCS program is about 34 years old. By comparison, the median age for the on-campus program is about 23 years old.
